Uses of Package
bgu.spl.mics

  • Packages that use bgu.spl.mics 
    Package Description
    bgu.spl.mics  
    bgu.spl.mics.impl  
  • Classes in bgu.spl.mics used by bgu.spl.mics 
    Class and Description
    Broadcast
    A "Marker" interface extending Message.
    Callback
    a callback is a function designed to be called in the future in order to handle a result of some operation (i.e., message received).
    Message
    A message is a data-object which is passed between micro-services as a means of communication.
    MicroService
    The MicroService is an abstract class that any micro-service in the system must extend.
    Request
    A "Marker" interface extending Message.
  • Classes in bgu.spl.mics used by bgu.spl.mics.impl 
    Class and Description
    Broadcast
    A "Marker" interface extending Message.
    Message
    A message is a data-object which is passed between micro-services as a means of communication.
    MessageBus
    The message-bus is a shared object used for communication between micro-services.
    MicroService
    The MicroService is an abstract class that any micro-service in the system must extend.
    Request
    A "Marker" interface extending Message.
